resources.string:
Welcome to the NOn-verbal Mental Model Elicitation Tool (NOMMET)!

Below you can choose to:
 - start uploading files to tailor the tool to your needs
 - start session to start mapping mental models, change settings or to download your data
 - show the manual if you want to learn more about how to use NOMMET

Here you can upload the relevant audio/video/image files to tailor NOMMET to your needs.\n\nOnce you have uploaded a file, it should show on this screen. Once you have uploaded all your files here, you can go to start session/settings to indicate where you want each file to operate within NOMMET.
